data.actual_result: your game will be what u typed but the logo will be the right logo and the client will treat it like the acual game
data.expected_result: It should still show the question mark logo unless it is the official game
data.short_description: You can "play" a game u aint playin and/or dont own
data.steps_to_repro: - go to games settings - use any application u can change name (for example the system which is normally used for custom playing msgs) - change the name to a game name like Subnautica or Slime Rancher ect - click on ur profile and look at ur playing status
